means.word_mean: 1. (Sanskrit) god of fire in ancient and traditional India; one of the three chief deities of the Vedas

auth_sentence.content: And once in service, the Agni's range would cover all of Pakistan and it could also reach deep into Chinese territory.

auth_sentence.content: But India is also working on a much longer range system - the Agni - that could reach targets up to 2, 500km away.
